# Entitlement dashboard

The Entitlement dashboard provides insights into entitlement usage, billing volume, and addon consumption, highlighting critical usage thresholds.

![Dashboard](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/16b713b7-06c3-4634-abd1-9ccf02bf623d?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..tl8GgfJ-zBPRQWANRDRl8ugBZ9uLUZB3BfouL-yJOIM)

-   The warning symbol denotes 80% entitlement usage, while the warning color turns red upon 100% consumption.

-   Billing Volume Usage displays the total data consumed for the current billing cycle, and the highlighted volume represents the total data entitled. The value NINE represents the package purchased.

-   With Addon displays the consumed addons, and the highlighted value represents the addons entitled based on the subscription.
